hero.title: WE LOOK FOR UNUSED PROPERTIES AND TRANSFORM THEM INTO WORK SPACES
hero.titleMovile: FIND A FLEXIBLE SPACE FOR YOUR BUSINESS

video.title: We manage all types of unused properties
video.description: Have you not been able to rent your property? We take care of managing your property with flexible and short-term contracts. Are you looking for a flexible work space? We have spaces in excellent locations for entrepreneurs and artists.

hero_2.title: FIND A FLEXIBLE SPACE FOR YOUR BUSINESS

details.title: Large organizations trust us
details.description: We manage all types of real estate during the period prior to demolition, with flexible and short-term contracts. In this way we generate valor from a frozen resource.

questions.title: Frequent questions
questions.question1: 1. What requirements are required to rent a room?
questions.response1: One month guarantee payment is required.
questions.response2: The value of the lease includes all the basic expenses of the house: water, electricity, piped gas, Wi-Fi internet and cleaning service for common areas. Spaces such as the kitchen, living room and garden are for shared use. An administrator lives in all our properties, who is in charge of the residence to help you solve any problem and manage a good stay.
questions.response3: Some properties have parking. An extra of $20,000.- per month must be considered in addition to the normal values of a room.
questions.name: Name

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.gestDescription: Airbnb's mission is to build a world where anyone can feel at home wherever they go. There are millions of Listings to satisfy the desires of different travelers: from cabins to castles, even through cooking classes. To learn more about a Listing, you should refer to the description and photos, the Host's profile, and previous Guest reviews. If you have any questions, send the Host a message.
terms.airbnbDescription: 2.1 Search. Host Services can be searched by applying search parameters, such as Host Service type, destination, dates and number of guests. Filters can also be used to narrow down the search results. Search results are based on matching search parameters and other criteria. Factors such as price, availability, reviews, customer service and cancellation history, popularity, previous trips, Saved Listings, and Host requirements (e.g., minimum or maximum number of Hosts) are taken into account. of nights), among others. For more information about search results, see the Airbnb Help Center.
terms.airbnbDescription2: 2.2 Reserve. By booking a Listing, you agree to pay all applicable charges, including the price of the Listing, applicable fees such as Airbnb service fee, fees paid offline, taxes, and any other items listed on the Listing. payment page (collectively referred to as<< Total Price>>. You further agree that Airbnb, through Airbnb Payments, may charge the Payment Method (defined in the Payment Terms) used to book the Listing for the purpose of charging the sums corresponding to a Claim for Damages (as defined in these Terms). Upon receipt of the reservation confirmation, a contract for Host Services (a << Reservation >>) is formalized directly between you and the Host. In addition to these Terms, You will be bound by all the terms of the Reservation and will have the obligation to comply with them, including the cancellation policy and any other rule, regulation, policy or requirement identified. stated in the Advertisement or during the payment process that are applicable to the Reservation. It is your responsibility to read and understand these rules, standards, policies and requirements before booking a Listing. Please note that some Hosts work with a co-host or as part of a team when offering their Host Services.
terms.airbnbDescription3: 2.3 Accommodation Reservations. An Accommodation Reservation constitutes a limited license to access, use and stay in the Accommodation. The Host reserves the right to access the Accommodation during the Guest's stay, provided that: i) it is reasonably necessary, ii) it is permitted by the contract signed between you and the Host, and iii) it is permitted by applicable law. If you remain in the Accommodation past the check-out time, the Host may force you to leave by legal means, including the imposition of reasonable penalties. You may not exceed the maximum number of Guests allowed.
terms.airbnbDescription4: 2.4 Reservations of Experiences and other Host Services. The Reservation of an Experience or other Host Service entitles you to participate, attend or enjoy that Host Service. You are responsible for confirming that you and any

owners.title: We manage all types of unused properties
owners.subtitle: Have you not been able to rent your property? We take care of managing your property with flexible and short-term contracts. In this way we generate VALUE from a frozen resource.
owners.description_1: Take care of and avoid misuse of the property: access by squatters or criminals to steal from neighbors (focus of crime), etc.
owners.description_2: Generate an extra monthly monetary income for the property owner from a frozen resource.
owners.description_3: Provide an economic opportunity for spaces for entrepreneurs and art development centers in various parts of the capital.
